CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 13, 1954, pg. 8 reads: "At Trinity - The Rev. C.E. Drummer, pastor of Park AME Church, Homestead, will speak for Family and Friends Day, Sunday, Nov. 21, at Trinity AME Church, Francis Street and Wylie Avenue. The program is headed by Mrs. Sylvia Cheek as chairman, Mrs. Effie Williams and Mrs. Ethel Leftwich as co-chairmen. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Rev. C.E. Drummer wearing dark three piece suit and necktie with swirl design, standing in Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper office with portrait of Jessie Vann
